biotools.summary: Cheetah is a simple to use Python library to support the development of analysis workflows and real-time cybergenetic control platforms that combine microscopy imaging and environmental control. The toolkit relies on a U-Net convolutional neural network to perform cell segmentation and uses this with additional functions that can label, track and generate control signals based on this information.
